thread.title: Drivers express their frustration at Operation Stack congestion
thread.title_full: Drivers express their frustration at Operation Stack congestion | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Drivers express their frustration at Operation Stack congestion
text:
Drivers have taken to Twitter to express their frustration, with Operation Stack in place on the M20 again.
Rachael Root @rachaelroot_ Follow Operation stack can't be on again?! I don't have time to sit in traffic jams all the time!!
10:25 - 22 Jul 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite It was implemented this morning due to traffic building up towards the Port of Dover and Eurotunnel.
JWR @JWRTalks Follow #OperationStack is once again in force. What's this, the 6th time in 3 weeks? #GettingStupid & #unfair on #Kent residents!
10:22 - 22 Jul 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite The motorway is closed coastbound between junctions 8 and 9 to non freight traffic, with congestion building up to junction 7.
Poppy @Smaug_81 Follow I think @ kentpoliceroads are doing a great job trying to keep m20 moving & safe, #operationstack not their fault. It's just v frustrating!!
10:18 - 22 Jul 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite A petition to stop Operation Stack has received more than 15,000 signatures since it was launched two weeks ago.
Andy Law @AndyLaw1976 Follow Well, I'm in the queue for the diversion off the M20 now. #operationstack What fun.
10:42 - 22 Jul 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Last updated Wed 22 Jul 2015 Read more 3 updates The return of Operation Stack Travel Dover m20 operation stack Kent
